domain.hello: Please tell me which domain do you want to access.
domain.perfectly_legal:
You are now in *.
Please tell me the connection you want to build.
domain.partly_illegal: Do you mean the following domain?
domain.totally_illegal:
Sorry, I can't recognize your intention.
Please enter again the domain to access.

subdomain.success_true:
You are now in *.
Please tell me the connection you want to build.
subdomain.success_false:
Sorry, I can't find the domain you specified.
Please enter again the domain to access
subdomain.fail:
Sorry, I can't recognize your intention.
Please enter again the domain to access.

Do you have any bandwidth requirement?

netservice.totally_illegal:
Sorry, I can't recognize your intention.
Please enter again the nodes to connect.
netservice.multi_illegal:
Sorry, you can only build on connection at one time.
Please enter again the nodes to connect.

Do you have any bandwidth requirement?
